# Course assessment

Students will be assessed on the basis of the following components:

- [**10%**] Presence and class participation;

- [**40%**] Completion of a homework assignment between week 1 and week 2. The homework will consist of exploring rating data from a provided data set and producing a basic visual report of the data. Details can be found [[here](https://vini-macuch-silva.github.io/basics-of-data-viz-for-behavioral-scientists/asssessment/homework1/homework1.html)];

- [**50%**] Completion of a final assignment consisting of drafting a tentative "results" section of a scientific paper built around publication-ready visualizations of both rating data and reaction time data from a provided data set. Details can be found here [[here]()].
